text:
@realDonaldTrump If our Country would've banned Chinese people from coming in from January, we wouldn't be in the mess we're in now.
I think China should be punished for the outbreak of Covid-19 it's the 2nd time now that they've infected other Countries with their dirty Virus Diseases.
